title: Hi-Rez Studios, Inc Status
text: Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Feb 22, 18:09 EST Update - We will be patching Paladins PC tomorrow to address issues with the game. Feb 22, 18:09 EST Monitoring - We are currently working on issues with Paladins PC. #PALADINS PC Feb 22, 10:05 EST Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Feb 22, 09:34 EST Monitoring - We are currently limiting logins as we look into issues with Paladins PC. Feb 22, 09:13 EST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Feb 22, 08:48 EST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Feb 22, 05:30 EST Scheduled - We will be updating #Smite on #Xbox to 4.2 tomorrow morning. Limited access will begin at 5:30 AM EST. Feb 21, 12:54 EST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Feb 22, 08:47 EST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Feb 22, 04:30 EST Scheduled - We will be updating #Smite on #PS4 to 4.2 tomorrow morning. Limited access will begin at 4:30 AM EST. Feb 21, 12:54 EST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Feb 22, 08:45 EST Verifying - Verification is currently underway for the Paladins PC maintenance items. #Paldins PC Feb 22, 06:47 EST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Feb 22, 06:45 EST Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled Paladins PC maintenance during this time. Feb 22, 06:44 EST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Feb 22, 06:30 EST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Feb 22, 03:45 EST Scheduled - We will be upgrading Paladins PC starting 4am EST. #PALADINS PC Feb 21, 19:27 EST Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Feb 22, 00:55 EST Investigating - We will be performing an emergency restart of #Smite on #PC. We are very sorry for the inconvenience. Servers will be going offline in 10 minutes. Feb 22, 00:27 EST
